Burbank.Vibe Hotel: The Vibe Hotel was originally known as the “Movie Town Motel”. It was built, owned and operated in 1952 by the Italian immigrant brothers Salvador and Antonio Pinelli. It is located on Hollywood Boulevard in Los Angeles, California, USA. This is considered to be part of the “Hollywood Strip” that runs through the heart of Hollywood beneath the Hollywood Sign and past Hollywood and Highland where the Dolby Theatre is now the permanent home to the Oscars every year.
